org.jooby

Class Route.Definitions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jooby.Route.Definitions
  • Enclosing interface:
    Route

    public static class Route.Definitions
extends Object
    Collection of Route.Definition useful for registering/setting route options at once.
    Since:
    0.5.0
    Author:
    edgar
